work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Devised and executed growth strategies including market penetration and expansion, product development and diversification, new customer acquisition and targeted marketing campaigns. Formulated and administered policies and procedures to increase profit margins and decrease operations expenses. Managed and guided a team of 18 members.
highlights: Streamlined an expansive menu generating $146000 in annual revenue
Launched an expedited shipping option for meal kits delivery service, boosting revenue by 22%
Renegotiated existing contracts and terms with strategic vendors, slashing food costs by 11%
Integrated a new payroll system, trimming administrative outsourcing costs by 24%
Deployed an inventory management software, minimizing food waste and spoilage by 81%
Mandated all employees to undergo a rigorous sanitation and food safety training programs,
Maintained for 10 straight years a sanitary safety inspection score of 100 by the Fort Worth Consumer Health Division

Improved food quality and freshness, sidestepping food wholesaler and sourcing directly from farmers and producers, procuring 100 % organic produce, non GMO ingredients and antibiotics and hormone free meats and poultry.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed Steak and Ale'sTexas location in profit and revenue generation ($3.53 million annually). Conducted all staff hiring, onboarding, training, retention initiatives, performance appreciation, and disciplinary action
highlights: Added high margin menu items, offered daily specials, introduced new happy hour promotions, and coached servers in upselling techniques, revenue generating measures achieved an average check increase of 9%

Reevaluated labor cost, reduced waste and theft, renegotiated lease terms, installed energy efficient equipment and instructed staff to multitask, cost cutting measures achieved 12% decrease in overhead expenses
Spearheaded a customer loyalty program that fostered retention and generated 73% in repeat business
Committed to elevate customer experience by ensuring cheerful greetings, adequate staffing, order accuracy, prompt, courteous service and solution based complaints
Led 39 staff members, managerial competency resulted in the lowest employee turnover rate from 2003 to 2008
Orchestrated and implemented a customer feedback report card
Honored with Manager of the Year Award; five consecutive years.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared and filed over 500 State and Federal tax returns for individuals, businesses, and charities. Collaborated and advised taxpayer with notice correspondence management, audit preparation and representation. Trained and mentored first year tax associates
highlights: Earned H&R Block Academy's highestever test scores
Outpaced upsell goals by 40%; ranked first districtwide for attached product sales revenue
Gained a 98% client recommendation score and a 96% retention rate
Completed 1000+ hours in IRS accredited training courses, acquired the third highest tax preparer seniority position within H&R Block
Recipient of the prestigious Henry W. Bloch Excellence in Client Service Award.
